package.name: mdr_lwr_kinematics
package.description:
This package provides forward kinematics and an analytical inverse kinematics solver for the Kuka LWR (Light-Weight Robot). The inverse kinematics solver is generated by IkFast [1].
[1] http://openrave.org/docs/latest_stable/openravepy/ikfast/
package.author: Sven Schneider
